Synopsis: Removes specific or all access rules for a user or group from a file or folder.
Description: This function removes specific or all access rules for a specified user or group from a file or folder. It can be used to manage file permissions effectively.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Remove-FilePermission -Path "C:\Example\File.txt" -UserOrGroup "User1"
Removes access rules for "User1" from the file "File.txt".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Remove-FilePermission -Path "C:\Example\Folder" -All
Removes all access rules from the folder "Folder".
